weko_file_added: A user added a draft file to a JAIRO Cloud index in a project
weko_file_removed: A user removed a draft file from a JAIRO Cloud index in a project
weko_index_linked: A user linked a JAIRO Cloud index to a project
weko_folder_created: A user created a draft folder in JAIRO Cloud in a project
weko_item_deposited: A user deposit item in a JAIRO Cloud index in a project
weko_node_authorized: A user authorized the JAIRO Cloud addon for a project
weko_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the JAIRO Cloud addon for a project
weko_node_deauthorized_no_user: JAIRO Cloud addon for a project deauthorized
